snippet: Ignazio Scaravilli, was in good condition in Tripoli, awaiting his return to Italy.
abstract: Italy's Foreign Ministry reports Ignazio Scaravilli, Italian doctor kidnapped in Libya in January, has been freed and is in good condition.
lead_paragraph: Ignazio Scaravilli, was in good condition in Tripoli, awaiting his return to Italy.

headline.main: Italy: Doctor Abducted in Libya Is Freed
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Italy: Doctor Abducted in Libya Is Freed
